languages.text: {n}Дрожащая фигура, укутанная в несколько слоев потрепанной одежды, направляет на вас старое лазружье:{/n} "К-кто вы? Именем Бога-Императора, н-не приближайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Дрожащая фигура, укутанная в несколько слоев потрепанной одежды, направляет на вас старый лазган:{/n} "К-кто вы? Именем Бога-Императора, н-не приближайтесь!"

languages.text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащая фигура, укутанная в несколько слоев потрепанной одежды, направляет на вас старое лазружье:{/n} "К-кто вы? Именем Бога-Императора, н-не приближайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the Emperor, k-keep away from me!"
{n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the Emperor, k-keep away from me!"
{n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"
{n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"
{n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

languages.text: {n}ボロボロの服に包まれた震える姿が、古いラスガンを向けて言った。{/n}「あ、あなたは誰ですか？神帝陛下の名において、私に近づくな！」
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ボロボロの服に包まれた震える姿が、古いラスガンを向けて言った。{/n}「あ、あなたは誰ですか？神帝陛下の名において、私に近づくな！」

languages.text: {n}La silhouette tremblante, engoncée dans de nombreuses couches de guenilles, pointe un vieux fusil laser sur vous.{/n} « Qu-qui êtes-vous ? Au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, je vous interdis de m'approcher ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette tremblante, engoncée dans de nombreuses couches de guenilles, pointe un vieux fusil laser sur vous.{/n} « Qu-qui êtes-vous ? « Au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, je vous interdis de m'approcher ! »

languages.text: {n}一个裹着好几层破烂衣服的身影颤抖着，用一把破旧的激光枪指着你。{/n}“你……你是什么人？神皇在上，离……离我远点！”
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一个裹着好几层破烂衣服的身影颤抖着，用一把破旧的激光枪指着你。{/n}“你……你是什么人？神皇在上，离……离我远点！”

languages.text: {n}La figura temblorosa envuelta en varias capas de ropa harapienta te apunta con un rifle láser anticuado:{/n} «¿Q-quién es usted? Por el Dios-Emperador, ¡aléjese de mí!».
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura temblorosa envuelta en varias capas de ropa harapienta te apunta con un rifle láser anticuado:{/n} «¿Q-quién es usted? Por el Dios-Emperador, ¡aléjese de mí!».

languages.text: {n}Die zitternde Gestalt, die in mehrere Schichten zerfetzter Lumpen gehüllt ist, richtet ein altes Lasergewehr auf dich:{/n} "W-Wer seid Ihr? Im Namen des Gottimperators, b-bleibt mir vom Leib!"
languages.original_text: {n}The quivering figure wrapped in several layers of tattered clothes is pointing an old lasgun at you:{/n} "W-who are you? In the name of the God-Emperor, k-keep away from me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zitternde Gestalt, die in mehrere Schichten zerfetzter Lumpen gehüllt ist, richtet ein altes Lasergewehr auf dich:{/n} "W-Wer seid Ihr? Im Namen des Gottimperators, b-bleibt mir vom Leib!"

languages.text: {n}Birkaç kat yırtık pırtık kıyafete sarılmış titreyen suret sana eski bir silazer doğrultuyor.{/n} "Kimsin sen? Tanrı İmparator adına benden uzak dur!"
